records.story: We spot an UFO on the sky in Queens over the Long Island Expresway. We were driving to the city of Manhathan on the Long Island Expressway.  The traffic was heavy and we were moving very slow, when i saw something that looks like a very bright blue airplane. I told my daughters l"look" I was just going to play with them.  Suddenly the object turn around unexpectedly  going  north of the LIE, when it turns we saw like 2 lines of lights in a very bright blue and red.  The object move further north and then it came back again. Looks like it was just playing in the sky.   I was still driving but my daughters keep looking at it until we were gone.   We wonder what is that?  Is it an experiment from the government?   It looks leery comfortable in the area. Like is not even trying to hide.

records.summary: Visited.
records.story: visited I have told only 2 people in my life about this experience, i was 4 or 5 years old when this happened to me, living in the Bronx NY.   One night my father was going to work I was in my bed and could hear my mother speaking to him at the door, when something picked me up and sat in what I thought was a chair, but there weren't any chairs in the bedroom, it sat there with me in its lap.  I know it wasn't my mother or father they were at the door as I could hear them, I became afraid because the only people lived in that apt were me,mom and dad.   Anyway I felt the skin on my thighs and arms( being a child I slept in underwear and tee-shirt), the skin was like a slim jim(beef stick) years later this is the only thing I could associate with the texture of the skin and dark brown, it was not male or female, skinny, small oval shaped head, large black eyes in over sized sockets, I didn't see a mouth, now my eyes were opened, but I was calm, no fear.  I woke up that mor! ning sun shining, I never spoke of it until I was 38 yrs old.  However I do have the ability to see things and places that I have never been before but can describe them.  Once when I worked at a plasma center a client had lost his ring, I told him to go home and look on the floor behind a nightstand in his bedroom, I just said it, he came back and asked me how I knew.   I am 58 years old now, family and friends say that I don't age.     This is a true story.

records.summary: Saucer Shaped Object Seen Near George Washington Bridge NYC
records.story: Saucer Shaped Object Seen Near George Washington Bridge NYC I was driving back to CT and about 1 mile from the George Washington Bridge in NYC. I looked up while I was idling in heavy traffic. To my left I saw a perfect flying saucer shaped object, wobbling and rotating to the left of my passenger side.  It was very high up but could be seen plainly as a "classic" flying saucer. I watched it for about a minute as I idled in traffic that was standing still for quite awhile.  I continued to watch it over a 2-3 minute period, it just kept hovering and wobbling and rotating. As I drove forward about 5 MPH for abit, I was able to continue to watch it.  It stayed in the same area the whole time, hovering and spinning.  It was slate grey color.  I noticed typical aircraft, jets, etc. flying toward or away from one of the airports...this saucer object was much lower than the aircraft I saw in their flight pattern.  The object was possibly 200 feet above the highway. ((NUFORC Note:  Source elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Flying object in front of Freedom Tower.  ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect it's a bird...bald eagle?.., flying with fish in its talons.  PD))
records.story: Flying object in front of Freedom Tower My wife took the attached photo of Freedom Tower on Jan 1 2014.  She was on the New Jersey side of the Hudson River.  She did not notice the strange object in front of the tower at the time.  She took a second photo 2 seconds later and the object is not there. I have tried to make sense of the object but I cannot.  It does not appear to be a bird.  My wife thinks it's a drone, but where is the propulsion.  If you zoom on it, there is a white glow or haze on the top of the object. The camera was an old Kodak digital mod C533.  I did not set the time stamp when I put batteries in so it is not accurate.  ((NUFORC Note:  We suspect it's a bird, possibly a bald eagle, flying with fish in its talons.  PD))

records.summary: Orange Orb does a doubletake.
records.story: Orange Orb does a doubletake. I was walking down Stanhope Street and noticed an orange orb in the sky. It appeared out of nowhere, travelled a certain distance(at cloud level it was what would measure 600 yards), and disappeared.  What was strange is that 2 seconds later the event happened again!  The same altitude, the same distance, the same speed, the EXACT SAME START POINT and THE EXACT SAME END POINT.  I've never seen anything in my life that wasn't scientifically explainable.  The orb wasn't even moving fast, but it was steady and streamlined. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the incident is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: Orb or throgsneck bridge.
records.story: orb or throgsneck bridge Sometime in the late 1960's probably close to 1966 my family of 6 were traveling north on the throgsneck bridge just prior to sunrise.  We were traveling to PA in the family station wagon and in the car were my parents, my sister, 2 brothers and myself.  I believe I was about 6 to 8 years old, my sister was about 12 years old and my brothers were a year younger and a year older then me.  The traffic was light and the sky was clear and bright enough that the cars did not need to have there headlights on. When we were probably about 2/3 of the way across the bridge, my entire family other than my parents recall seeing an extremely large light green glowing orb hovering above the bridge and so close to it that we all remember my sister screaming because she thought this orb was going to hit the bridge and knock it down.  This entire sighting lasted probably no longer than 10 seconds and no one remembers observing this orb flying away as it just seemed to disappear. An explanation as to why my parents who were in the front seat did not observe this orb is possibly because my sister and I were seated in the far back of the station wagon which were rear facing seats and that orb did not appear until we were 2/3 of the way across the bridge and it was behind when it 1st appeared.  My parents remember everyone screaming and yelling about what we had seen and they clearly remember the incident. This orb had no distinguishing marks and the entire family agrees that it was not the moon or the sun. As for the size of the orb, I would say at least 300 yds in diameter and I might be underestimating it by quite a bit.  The distance that it was from the bridge I would estimate 300yds or maybe even closer. This incident was never discussed again until about 20 years later at a family reunion when someone brought up ufos and for some reason we all remembered the incident like it happened yesterday. Without a doubt there had to be numerous other witnesses to this sighting because of the clear day, the size of the object and how close it was to the bridge. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness indicates that the date of the incident is approximate.  PD))

records.summary: SILVER BULLET UFO HOVERING STATIONARY IN BROOKLYN SKY, THEN VANISHED!
records.story: SILVER BULLET UFO HOVERING STATIONARY IN BROOKLYN SKY, THEN VANISHED! This morning the sky was blue.  Weather was nice.   I looked up at the sky as I left the Costco Warehouse and noticed lots of chemtrails crisscrossing the beautiful blue sky.  As I was gazing up, I noticed a silver bullet shaped object hovering stationary way up in the sky to the right of Costco between 2nd & 3rd Avenue, around 35th Street.   I looked down and back up and saw that the object was still there not moving.  It did not have any wings or propellers.  It was not a blimp.  No sound coming from it.  It was silent and silverbullet shaped and stationary high up.   I took out my camera to try and photograph it, but my zoom was not working properly.  As I looked up again, I noticed a airplane heading towards its direction.  As the airplane got closer towards the object...the object (UFO) simple disappeared!  Vanished right before my eyes!   I looked all around the sky and nothing!  Where did it go? ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.story: Boomerang or Triangular 5 Blueish White Lights. Occurred during a thunderstorm.  The Craft was boomerang or triangular in shape with 5 Blueish White Lights underneath.   I was living in The Bronx at the time and object was heading South towards Manhattan.  There was a movie being shown in Central Park Pocahontas that evening with a Fireworks Display.  Object made no noise and moved fast.

records.summary: Cylindrical object, glassy/translucent, in vicinity of helicopters.
records.story: Cylindrical object, glassy/translucent, in vicinity of helicopters. Proceeding down the pedestrian walkway on Fort Hamilton Parkway, in Brooklyn NY, approaching Prospect Park, I observed three helicopters circling (wide and rapidly), to the northeast, as well as some flashes from the helicopters.  For orientation, my position would have put the Statue of Liberty to the southwest at approximately my 8:00.  From my perspective (about 15 feet elevated from ground level) the helicopters were at 30-40 degrees off horizon.  I thought the behavior of the helicopters odd, and wanted to video it, but managed only to get a series of photographs them (on a Droid Razr phone).  In reviewing the photos, I found one photo shows what appeared to be a cylindrical object, at a slight cant, reflecting light with a glassy aspect, in the vicinity of the helicopters.  I am an attorney by training, and work in a corporate setting.

records.story: Bright red cycle over Queens County, NYC on east night skyline. Moving fast and staying on one place. On the east skyline bright red cycle for 2 min...disappeared and than again almost 2 min.  Position on one place and suddenly very fast move toward to North...again position on one place...moving fast into the distance ... disappeared to the North

records.summary: 5 lights in the sky, Bronx nyc.  Flying together, size of the stars.  Bright like the stars. 2/22/2014.
records.story: 5 lights in the sky, Bronx nyc.  Flying together, size of the stars.  Bright like the stars. 2/22/2014. Last night was coming ou of AMC movie theater with my wife, nephew and son.  And look at the sky to see the stars, they were so shine, and suddenly I noticed  five lights like, the size and bright  as the stars, I can not describe exactly the shape because this is the first time in my life I saw something like that, it was moving in the sky I thought a was a plane but my wife told me no, that is not a plane, then I  said looks like birds, but they were to high in the sky, and what it was even weird, this five lights while moving started to separate 3 of the lights from the other 2 lights, but still  Moving on, then when I finally decided to grab my iphone from my pocket to recorded this lights vanished in the sky.

records.summary: Red green UFO or drone sighting Brooklyn
records.story: red green UFO or drone sighting Brooklyn I was watching Conan.  To the left of our TV is a window that has a mostly unobstructed view of the sky.  There are no buildings behind our apartment, and the trees are bare, which allowed me to see the sky clearly.  Suddenly a circular red and green light caught my eye.  I believe I either saw a UFO or (more likely) a drone.  It was hovering in the sky.  I got up and went to the window.  I pointed it out to my girlfriend, who was sitting on the couch facing away from the window, but she didn't look fast enough.  Once I got up, I saw the object for only a few moments, and then it flew out of my view.  Again, it was circular, red and green (half red, half green, shaped a lot like that old Simon game), and it moved fluidly.  We live not far from airports, but it was nothing like the usual air traffic (planes or helicopters) we see on a regular basis.

records.summary: AGAIN!  Just two days ago, same bright red cycle,route...loop...stayed on one place maneuver repeated,flu away.
records.story: AGAIN!  Just two days ago, same bright red cycle, route...loop...stayed on one place maneuver repeated, flew away. Same thing happened two days ago, but this time was closer above our house, south/east. All time was cycle visible.  Stayed on one place and than suddenly fast move, route almost like a loop and stayed on one place.  This time we could see also some other/small light on the project, white/light blue color.   This maneuver was repeated one more time and project flu away toward to the East.

records.summary: ((POSSIBLE HOAX??))  2 balls of light in sky no sound military chasing it.
records.story: 2 balls of light in sky no sound military chasing it I witnessed 2 ball of light color amber hovering in formation, it was low in altitude and had no sound whatsoever.  i observed for bout 30 secs and they disappeared in the clouds.  i went home about 2 blocks away from my home.  10 minutes later i observed within 1 hr around 45 military airplanes going in the same direction.  i recorded most of them.  there was something going on as ive never observed so many aircraft going the same direction 2 mins apart.  they where loud!  they where military aircraft U.S. Air Force V shape and helicopters.  the ufos where flying slow and together in formation!  this is my second report, i originally reported only 7 aircraft following the sighting, it has climbed up to 50,  i called 311 to see if they had received similar reports but none, i guess we will find out tom!  they are out there.  ((NUFORC Note:  We are uncertain as to whether this is a serious report, or not.  Contact information did not allow us to contact the source.  PD))

records.summary: I was standing on my balcony smoking a cigarette and all of a sudden I saw a white object come out of the clouds. It glided from the di
records.story: I was standing on my balcony smoking a cigarette and all of a sudden I saw a white object come out of the clouds. It glided from the distance right over my house.   At that time, I literally pulled my friend from inside the house onto the balcony just as it passed overhead.  He saw it and his first response was its gotta be a kite.  However it could not have been a kite because a kite would stay in one area and not fly over head.   I had a very good look at it and I can absolutely say that it was a white object it almost looked like the same color as the clouds but there was a little glow to it and my friend said he noticed an orange light.  It flew over with no sound and it was gliding gently.   Whatever it was I know for a fact it was not a plane (cause of the shape) or like anything I have ever witnessed..  I really want to know who else in Brooklyn saw it because it flew over bay ridge heading towards Manhattan and other people had to of seen it

records.summary: Orange stingray-shaped object, followed by 2 orange globes
records.story: orange stingray-shaped object, followed by 2 orange globes It was a clear night, and there were several stars out. I saw what looked like a Roman candle rise up into the sky.  I had been looking southeast.  The object did not dissipate into the air, but instead, started to fly north, in the eastern sky.  It looked like a flaming orange stingray.  For a moment I thought it was a plane on fire.  It continued on and finally disappeared behind a building. It seemed to be flying at the same speed as a regular airplane.  A few seconds later, I saw an orange globe flying from south to north.  This one did not rise up from the same spot as the first one.  It went over the building, and immediately after, another one followed.  These two were also flying at airplane speed.  I do not recall if I heard any sounds coming from these objects.

records.story: WHITE PLANE AT STANDSTILL HOVERS OVER 108ST. 67 AVE FOREST HILLS Driving towards 108 st 67th avenue, as passenger I saw a white plane shaped at complete "stand still" hovering over area. No airline logo at all.  Saw exact same in summer 2013

records.story: Park Slope Brooklyn around 7 to 8 p.m. a summer night I was 10 yrs old me and my friends saw a round shape saucer with multi color lights at the bottom of the Ufo over a building on 3rd street.

records.summary: Bright green light over Manhattan/North West.
records.story: Bright Green light over Manhattan/North West So my friend and I were in Inwood Hill Park, that's a park in Upper Manhattan almost crossing to the Bronx/Yonkers and we were just sitting, talking on a bench facing North. Now it was raining ALL DAY yesterday and it was drizzling a bit while we were there. Very cloudy..  Like gray sky..  You couldn't really distinguish one cloud.  There had been airplanes passing above and near us.  We could HEAR them but not SEE them because that's how cloudy it was. So anyway we were sitting there and we saw a BRIGHT green neon light orb looking about hmm a mile away.  It was hovering and then switched to a bright red/white light and then back to green. It was a constant green light.  It was NOT flashing.  The only time it flashed was when it was red/white for like 4 seconds.  The light was moving really fast towards us. (South) and then it went back really quickly and then it was moving downwards really fast and then to the sides..  THIS COULD NOT HAVE BEEN AN AIRPLANE or a JET or helicopter.. the angles it was moving in were crazy.  Kinda like zig zags. & then it vanished into thin air. This happen last night.. at about 12:30 am. It only lasted for about 35-40 seconds.  Tried to capture it with my iphone but it was too dark and far to make out..  My other friend may have gotten it on her phone but it was probably too dark to see. REALLY exciting..  Hoping someone out there saw it. and got it on film.

records.summary: Distant, white dot moving over Brooklyn, NY, disappears.
records.story: Distant, white dot moving over Brooklyn, NY disappears. Looking up at the moon, close to a star on the right side of the moon, a white dot appeared; started moving to the right.  Light was not flashing, and moved faster than an airplane but slower than a shooting star.  Light moved approximately 2.5ft, from point of view, before it completely disappeared.  It didn't get dim during disappearing time, and sky was clear with no clouds to block view of path.

records.summary: In the Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City, In a fourteenth floor apartment with a terrace,as I was smoking a cigarette in
records.story: In the Bronx, one of the five boroughs of New York City, In a fourteenth floor apartment with a terrace,as I was smoking a cigarette in the terrace, I saw Three yellow orbes decend over my right side of view.  I was in awe.  They stood hovering for about three minutes.   One went in the direction over my building. I couldn't see where he was.  But the other two stood hovering were they decended from.  Shortly, the two orbes went east. One led the way the other followed.  Then the other that I couldn't see came back to follow the others.   I woke my mother from her sleep.  I didn't want to be the only one seeing this phenomena.  I wonder, did anyone else see what I saw.  Many people here go to sleep late.

records.summary: UFO over Brooklyn, NYC, Flatbush Avenue.
records.story: UFO over Brooklyn, NYC, Flatbush Avenue. UFO spotted about 600 feet up, totally still in the air over Flatbush avenue and Filmore Avenue. The craft did not make a sound.  It was silver/reflective in color, with a neon green aura flowing around it. My friend and I saw it totally still in the air for about 2.5 minutes then it zoomed away like a laser in a "Nike check" sort of swoop and vanished.

records.summary: Formation above nyc during pride fest.
records.story: formation above nyc during pride fest At 8 pm ish from a park at west st and 18th, over head above 5000 ft were 4 spherical objects.  3 were in a triangle formation with one off to the side (west) they 'floated" in formation and moved in a north east direction toward the Hudson River ntil an airplane that recently took off from the north west flew in their direction. then, as a unit still in formation they changed direction of movement toward the north west.  objects were bright appeared sometimes spherical, sometimes triangular in shape  When a second aircraft approached (this airplane had red markings along the side and tail) they started to move again as a unit, in formation but just before the plane reached them they disappeared ! just like that. hey did not reappear.  They never changed altitude but seemed to stay the same size.  their altitude was above the planes that approached.  Im sure the pilots must have seen them.  hey reflected and may have produced light which was white-yellow! with a hint of orange.  The skye was clear with very little haze. a beautiful day and evening. ((NUFORC Note:  We question whether this is a serious-minded report.  Source describes himself as being a physician.  PD))

records.summary: Undiscernable, stationary, objects in the early evening sky.
records.story: undecernable stationary objects in the early evening sky. Yankee Stadium for Joel Osteen meeting.  At about 7:30 PM, I looked up into a clear blue sky and saw what could have been confused as a star.  However it occurred to me that it was too light out and what I was seeing could not be a star, which then got my interest.   Then I noticed another and another, until I counted about 6 objects.  I observed these objects for a few minutes and then asked my family to observe what I saw.   Everyone saw what I saw and some others around us started to look up as well.   Only 1 object moved much but the others were stationary and for all intents and purposes just points in the sky.  One had a definite orange to red color, but the others were a shade of silver.   During the 30 minutes of observation numerous jets crisscrossed the sky, many at extreme altitude, but the points seemed to be higher.   We all speculated as to what these things could be and we considered weather balloons, but felt uncertain as the objects were stationary (other than the one that moved slowly).   In all, I missed about 45 minutes due to this distraction, and turned my attention to the event.  When I checked the sky at dusk, all objects were gone.

records.summary: Very bright light, changing color and size, eventually moving/fading away towards the northwest. (1 hour total)
records.story: Very bright light, changing color and size, eventually moving/fading away towards the northwest. (1 hour total) looking in the direction of Manhattan from my roof in Sunnyside, Queens NY.  I observed what at first looked like a bright star in the distance.  However it was an overcast night and there were no other stars visible from that direction.   The light from this object seemed to change in color from time to time. From white to orange and maybe even some green.   My next thought it might be a helicopter hoovering over some part of Manhattan but I've lived in NY for over 20 years and never seen one hoover in the same place for so long.  This light eventually began to move to the right as I looked at it.   It also appeared to be moving downwards so I deducted that it was in fact moving away towards the north west.   Eventually I stopped looking and so don't know what happened next.

records.summary: 3 orange orbs over Brooklyn, NY
records.story: 3 orange orbs over Brooklyn, NY At 12:10am on June 30th, 2014, in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, NY, my wife and I went out on our patio for a cigarette.  I went out before her, lit my smoke and from the top of the stairs to our patio, my wife asked asked, “What are those?  They aren’t planes.”  I looked up to where she was pointing to the SSW.  There were two orangish orbs that were flickering slightly. The first thought I had was that they were Chinese Lanterns.  However, the hair on the back of my neck stood up as I realized that they were moving towards us and, far too fast to be any sort of lantern or balloon.  The objects appeared to be at 2,000 - 3,000 feet in altitude, moving at 200-300 miles per hour.  The two objects traveled silently and in apparent formation, perhaps 2,500 feet apart.  They traveled at a constant rate and did not change bearing. As the objects approached, not quite overhead, but maybe offset by about 15-degrees from directly overhead, I noticed that the glowing, flickering orange nearly disappeared and I was able to observe the underside of the objects, which appeared round in shape with a dark center and a ring of somewhat dim, fuzzy light around it.  The two objects disappeared behind our building.  I considering running through the front of the apartment to see if I could observe the objects on the other side of the building.  My wife ran inside to grab her camera.  She returned just as a third orb appeared and followed a similar vector to the other two objects. Again, as the third object passed nearly overhead, I observed the same structure as the first two objects.  My wife was able to get one very nondescript, streaked image with her camera but honestly, it doesn’t look like much. The entire incident lasted perhaps 30-40 seconds.  After the three objects had passed, my wife and I were somewhat shaken and tried to make any sense of what we had just seen.   They clearly were not any sort of aircraft or drone that I have seen (and I consider myself an aircraft aficionado along with being a drone and R/C aircraft pilot).  The other thought I had were that perhaps they were some sort of debris entering the atmosphere and burning up, but that would not account for what appeared to be a level flight path. About a minute or so after this, a commercial aircraft crossed the flight path of the objects at a perpendicular angle, heading east.  I have no idea if the pilot of that airliner, likely landing at JFK, was able to see what had just occurred, but I suppose we have no way of knowing.  We checked the internet for any other reports of this incident and found nothing, which is astonishing considering it occurred over New York City.  However, we found Nuforc and filed this report in hopes of anyone else coming out and reporting this.

records.summary: oval , yellow-orange ball swept the northen sky in flashing speed
records.story: oval , yellow-orange ball swept the northen sky in flashing speed Witnessed a very bright, ellipticle-shaped, yellowish/orange oval ball move quickly from left to right in a slight arc in the northern, clear sky.  The streak/tail length was about a long city block, perhaps two considering wheere I was standing in front of my home.  The stars were against the background sky canvas and in a clear sky. The speed was faster than an aircraft even from visual from ground distance.  There was no cherry bombing or rockets sounds.  It seems that it could have been about a 1-2 seconds and abruptly ceased.

records.summary: Small grey/silver metallic object, mostly circular in shape seen hovering and moving slowly at high altitude over the Hudson River.
records.story: small grey/silver metallic object, mostly circular in shape seen hovering and moving slowly at high altitude over the Hudson River While spending Memorial day weekend in the Long Island/NYC area, I visited the USS Intrepid Sea, Air, and Space Museum.  The day was Sunday, May 25th, 2014.   After touring the top deck and interior I made my way down the stairs to the adjacent dock area.  There were already multiple news and tour helicopters making their way up the Hudson River, while a US Coast Guard MH-65 was performing a Search and Rescue Demo (for NY Fleet Week) over the waterfront so naturally I had my eyes towards the sky, at just after noon (anywhere between 12:00 and 12:30) I noticed a small object at high altitude over the Hudson.   At first I suspected it to be merely a balloon, however after examining the object for a few seconds I noticed it appeared to be considerably larger than a normal balloon and it was hovering in place as if not affected by the present winds which a balloon would be.  Its coloration was also interesting, it appeared to mostly be a metallic grey or silver on the! surface.  I pointed it out to my father who quickly dismissed it as probably being a balloon (although he said he couldn't see it very well).  I began snapping photos of the object with my IPhone 5. I estimated the objects altitude to be around 4,000-5,000 feet because it was a lot higher than the helicopters flying up the Hudson but much lower than the occasional passing commercial airliner out of JFK airport, I had no way of guessing the objects size due to its distance and lack of anything close enough to it to compare it with, though it did appear to be larger than a balloon.   After a few minutes the object began a slow flight path moving diagonally but remaining at the same altitude, I began backing up to keep the object in view while taking pictures but it soon passed over the deck of the Intrepid and out of sight.  Although I didn't run into any other witnesses I think it is unlikely that I was the only one who saw it due to the sheer number of people in the area.   Upon uploading and reviewing the photos on my computer the following day, I noticed several things that I didn't notice while viewing the object,  The first few pictures showed exactly what I saw, a small rounded shiny metallic object hovering.  However, as I looked through the pictures I noticed the object had a darker, shaded edge in some pictures giving it more of a definitive shape (this may have been due to the sun reflecting from the other side of the object) while in other photos the object appeared to be very bright and shiny.  One of the photos the object is completely dark except for a small ring of light in the center that appears to be generated by the object, the rest of the object appears much more like a structured craft here with less of a circular shape and two corners on one side.  The final photos show the object again to be metallic and silver with the upper half being brighter (almost a whitish blue) and the lower half being a darker grey, there are also several dark patches on the edges of the object.  I have always been intrigued by the UFO phenomenon but have mostly remained a skeptic however I am questioning it now.  All I can say is that while knowing a lot about aviation and can easily identify most airplanes or helicopters, this object I witnessed and photographed did not move like or resemble any normal aircraft that I have seen in my life.

records.summary: Silver object hovering over Freedom Tower.
records.story: Silver object hovering over Freedom Tower. Bright silver round object hovering around the top of the Freedom Tower on all sides.   Object took off when the black helicopter came and just hovered facing the tower.

records.summary: Fireball over Manhattan
records.story: Fireball over Manhattan Looked  and saw a fireball object with a pinpoint light in the middle and ambient light around it.   It was moving as fast as the planes around it, but was distinctly NOT a plane.  We were in lower manhattan and the light disappeared over midtown. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Triangular Shape UFO's spotted near the border between the Bronx &Yonkers, NY
records.story: Triangular Shape UFO's spotted near the border between the Bronx &Yonkers, NY I spotted 3 UFO with a triangular shape right from my fire escape.  I reside in a building closed to Yonkers hills and have a perfect view of the Hudson River and the horizon.   The objects had 3 bright orbs on each end of the triangle sides.  I also noticed that it had like a cross shape light on the bottom of the object.   Then two additional UFO appeared and floated for about 5 min.   After that, lost track of time and slowly vanished in thin air.   I have video of the event, since is dark you can only see the red lights moving and vanishing.

records.summary: Flying object with large bright light-The object was moving rapidly and changed to at least 4 different colors. MARCH 31, 2014 NYC
records.story: Flying object with large bright light-The object was moving rapidly and changed to at least 4 different colors.  MARCH 31, 2014 NYC March 31, 2014, around 21:25, I was sitting on my couch when I spotted a bright light.   I then moved into my kitchen window to get a better view and there it was a flying object with large bright light.  The object was moving rapidly and changed to at least 4 different colors.  Red, Green, Blue, Purple.  I proceeded to take a video of the object with my I phone and I was able to get a good 2 minutes of filming the object.   After 2: 46 minutes of filming the object then rapidly moved south East towards the FDR East River Drive. Video is available upon request. Regards, ((name deleted))

records.summary: Undulating orange light.
records.story: Undulating Orange Light I was walking to my car at about 8 PM on October 1 2014. I am located in the Flatlands section of Brooklyn. The sky was overcast. I looked over the my left and saw an orange light undulating from North or Northwest to South or South East. It wasn't going very fast, but I only caught it from the time it took to travel in between two buildings in my field of vision. The best way I can describe the light is that it looked like an orange flare. It would dim from time to time and then flare up again. I thought it might be a helicopter, but I've never seen a helicopter undulate like that (and they generally have running lights, etc, instead of a single orange light). I am not sure at what altitude the clouds were, I don’t think they were particularly high, but this object seemed to be just underneath them. I viewed the object for 30 seconds or less. I'd be interested to know if anybody else witnessed this. Thanks!

records.summary: Two slowly moving black circles/ balls stopping and changing directions.
records.story: Two slowly moving black circles/ balls stopping and changing directions. I saw a circle object hovering moving very slowly, which seemed odd too slow to be an airplane or too high To be a helicopter or bird it looked like it stopped Every couple minutes then it would move again ( heading from Northwest towards southeast)in the Same direction but after 20-25 min it stopped again But this time it actually changed direction and started going North for another couple of minutes around 3-4 min Then I saw another similar object moving a little faster moving from Southwest towards North watched it for 2 minutes looked back at the First one watched it for a minute and then it just vanished( disappeared) Looked back to see if the second object was still there and it also disappeared Everything happened around that weird cloud formation that looked Like a thick white smoke from 8:15am to 8:45am. Was waiting to move my car For street cleaning and was sitting in front of my apartment building. Around 8:40am I thought it had to be balloons but after it changed directions I really don't know what it was, and I really believe that I saw an Unidentified Flying Object. ((initials deleted))

records.summary: White orb travels east across lower Manhattan.
records.story: White Orb travels East across lower Manhattan. 4 people were pointing up to the sky and we watched an orb travel east across the sky very slowly.

records.summary: Saucer that looked like Star Trek minus the tale, clear and 100 feet away.
records.story: Saucer that looked like Star Trek minus the tale, clear and 100 feet away. AT 10 PM I  was awoken from sleep by a humming noise.  I looked out of my bedroom window that faced south toward the Rockaways and saw this huge saucer about 100 feet from me hovering over my neighbors house.  I was twelve at the time and thought I was going nuts, but I could not move I was totally entranced and woke up the next day like a had the most surreal dream I have ever had in my life.  I did not tell my parents or my sister Lucille I just let it go, I figured they would all just laugh.  On 7/1 I was awoken again but when I heard the noise I ran to Lucille's room so I had a witness.  She thought I was nuts, but when she looked she stood there in amazement and just like me she woke up and told me her dream.  I said that was no dream that was for real.  We told our parents who called us nuts and checked us to see if we were green.  To date that is one thing me and her hold sacred, we may fight and not speak, but we never will deny the proof of UFO's.

records.summary: I was on my way to work. 1 Object, Flashing lights, could not see body of object. It did not move like conventional aircraft. It moved
records.story: I was on my way to work.  1 object, flashing lights, could not see body of object.  It did not move like conventional aircraft.  It moved from north to south. I thought it was a helicopter but copters don't move the way this did.  The lights where blinking white and blue.

records.summary: Long, green tail alternating fireball and not lasting 2-3 seconds moving left to right facing south
records.story: Long green tail alternating fireball and not lasting 2-3 seconds moving left to right facing south Was walking south down Clinton street between Atlantic and  state streets.  My girlfriend pointed at the sky and we both saw an object moving left to right with a long bright green tail.  The object was intermittently switching between a fireball and not.  It was definitely lower than the moon in the sky.  If I was to reach out and point at it I would guess the tip of my finger to have been 6' off the ground or slightly less.

records.summary: UFO OVER THE BRONX.
records.story: UFO OVER THE BRONX Im a taxi driver, while driving on the Bruckner Expressway i noticed a pulsing changing color very bright lights under a cloud in the sky:  I had two passengers with me at the moment   I got off the next available exit which was bronx river ave and park to the side a shoot the first  video that it last aproximately one minute.

records.summary: Bright orange/red fireball looking object flying over NY/NJ towards Verrazano Bridge.
records.story: Bright orange/red fireball looking object flying over NY/NJ towards Verrazano Bridge I live in a high rise building in Brooklyn, NY, and I was just going to bed shortly after midnight when I spotted what appeared to me as the set off of a fireworks towards the western sky.  When the "fireworks" didn't explode that's when my interest peaked.  The fireballs moved up from the horizon (did not see their origin, just moving straight up) and then hooked a left towards the Verrazano Bridge.  They were traveling for about a minute and then were no more.  There could have been more but I saw 13 objects, bright orange and red.  They all originated from the same point in the horizon but when they turned left towards the VB they have different flight patterns.  Did anyone else see them?

records.summary: Sting Ray like triangle + followed Pyramid shaped object.
records.story: Sting Ray like triangle + followed Pyramid shaped object It was a weird triangle shape.  After some though it looked like a stingray (without the tail.)  Behind it was a "pyramid" with flashing lights around the perimeter. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Walking home w/ my sister.  I squeeze  her arm and yelled look at the blue light.  We saw a bright blue glowing ball in the sky.
records.story: My sister and I was walking home.I squeeze  her arm and yelled look at the blue light.  We saw a bright blue glowing ball in the sky.  It went so fast across and disappeared.  It lasted no more than 5 seconds.

records.summary: 7 fireballs, 1 every 6 mins flying from the sky through bedstuy, bushwick brooklyn before disappearing to Manhattan.
records.story: 7 fireballs, 1 every 6 mins flying from the sky through bedstuy, bushwick brooklyn before disappearing to Manhattan. Saw an fireball come out of the clouds approx.  From Myrtle Ave. crossing park and flew towards manhattan before it disappeared into the clouds at the edge of Brooklyn. The first one flew low enough on park ave and stood a few seconds observing me before it flew off.  The center was like a yellow orange fire with a glow surrounding it.  The others followed the first every 6 mins at higher heights.

records.summary: 3 circling and spiraling orbs  over the area of the Rensaleer Amtrak train station.
records.story: 3 circling and spiraling orbs  over the area of the Rensaleer Amtrak train station. 3 spiraling and circling orbs over the Rensaleer Amtrak train station.   They appeared to be intelligently moving, and winked in and out.  They also darted off at high velocity and steep angles. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Fireball gliding over Brooklyn at 19:43, jumping flames within it heading a northeastern direction.9-11-14.
records.story: Fireball gliding over Brooklyn at 19:43,jumping flames within it heading a northeastern direction.9-11-14 At 19:43 this evening of 9/11/14, I was walking West to meet my husband at his job.I was walking down 40th Street in Brooklyn toward 3rd avenue.  I was on the phone with my friend from work and to my left, in the sky, I saw a ball of flames gliding in the sky.  It was gliding at the rate which a balloon would glide,not fast or slow just an easy glide...I kept looking to figure out what it was,all I could tell was there were flames bouncing up and down inside this ball.  The sky was dark behind it.  You could still tell there was a dark halo above the flames,as if they were encapsulated in a ball, sort of oval/egg shaped encapsulated.   It continued to glide in a North Eastern direction for about 2 minutes, until it passed over buildings and out of my view.  There was only one,the color of the flames were red/orange glowing with white tips.   I am going to draw a photo of what I saw and mail it to you, along with emailing a photo I got on my cell phone.  My phone would not allow me to video.  The video part was not showing up for me to activate, that was weird as well.   I was able to enable video, once the fireball disappeared. It was at a height where you knew it was high up ,but low enough that it was clear to see the bouncing flames within it.  I have never seen anything like this in my entire life.

records.summary: UFO sighting in Jamaica Queens, NY.
records.story: UFO sighting in Jamaica Queens NY They were 3 bright orange lights in the sky sitting still for a while. They were blinking.  They were evenly spaced in a straight line.  They sat there for like 2 mins then disappeared.  They reappeared from time to time.  Then after a few more sightings only one would appear in different locations in the sky above.  Until it just vanished.. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: I was leaving my bushwick apartment in brooklyn around 6:45 Am when something high in the sky caught my attention. It was moving in and
records.story: I was leaving my bushwick apartment in brooklyn around 6:45 am, when something high in the sky caught my attention.  It was moving in and out of the clouds and it look's like a white sphere glowing very bright and moving and doing manuvers that no plane or helicopter I seen can do.   It just hover back and forward for about 20 minutes before shooting very fast straight up into the sky, don't know what it was.

records.summary: 3 orange/red circular crafts seen during heavy cloud covered sky.
records.story: 3 orange/red circular crafts seen during heavy cloud covered sky Two orange/red circular shaped crafts in view over heavily cloud covered sky, flying slowly from east to west.   First craft drifts southward and disappears.   Second craft continue to fly westward and magnifies in brightness.   Third craft appears from east (same location as the previous two) and flew westward towards second craft.  Second craft then elevates while turning southward and slowly blinks out and disappears.  Third craft illuminates brightly then dims then repeats this while flying westward, turns southward and elevates above clouds and disappears.  Normal aircraft also seen flying in routine flight direction of south to north with visible blinking red and white lights on their sides.

records.summary: The object in question was close enough for me to see three lights. Two of them were closer to each other and the other in the front by
records.story: The object in question was close enough for me to see three lights.  Two of them were closer to each other and the other in the front by itself.   At first I thought maybe it was a helicopter, but the object traveled from one side the sky to the other in about two seconds, then blinked and completely disappeared.   The whole thing took less than five seconds. No airplane or helicopter I've seen ever moved this fast or blinked off like that.  Wow!

records.summary: Yankees vs Redsox Broadcast YES Network close up of the moon shows something shooting from the moon.
records.story: Yankees vs Redsox Broadcast YES Network close up of the moon shows something shooting from the moon On the Yankees vs Boston Redsox Broadcast on September 3rd.  They had a close up of the moon from one of their high lense television camera pointed at the moon (at about 1 hour 52 minutes and 24 seconds into the broadcast)(approx) If you look to the bottom left of the screen when they are showing the moon, you will see something streaking from the moon.  Its very quick shot but definitely something shooting from the moon.

records.summary: It was a star light object white moving then stopped.
records.story: It was a star light object white moving then stopped. I was out in my backyard, noticing the sky.  I looked up at what appeared to be a light or star like light in the sky very high in the sky.  It traveled from an eastern direction and moved toward western direction very slowly then stopped once, continued for a little bit then stopped directly above me.   After the first long pause, I noticed an aircraft (what appeared to be a plane) traveling toward the same direction as the ufo was going.  The plane then veered of adjacent toward the northwestern trajectory.   During  this point I was lying down on the concrete.  The object was shining brightly and stationery at this time.  I then noticed the clouds coming in and it became a lot fainter.  I decided to come inside and report this.   I then called the National UFO Reporting Center.  I went back outside and it was gone. That is it.P.S.Just to note I am former military and I am pretty good at distinguishing an aircraft verses something else.

records.summary: Oscillating black-ish/gray spherical object hovering in ther sky and disappeared.
records.story: Oscillating black-ish/gray spherical object hovering in ther sky and disappeared Last night, my 3 friends and I were on the roof in Manhattan.  We had a few bottles of wine, so we were a little warm, but not incoherent.  It was bright out because of the supermoon, so we had a clear view.   My friend, who pointed in the air, then told us to look.  3 of the 4 of us saw what looked like a thick blackish-gray disc, hovering in the air a few hundred feet out.  It was not a plane, because we had seen many moving around that night.   I thought it was a balloon floating up but my friend and I stood up and approached the edge of the rooftop to get a better view and I quickly ruled that out.  What I personally saw was something that looked large enough to not be a balloon, and it was definitely oscillating.  It made no sound, but I did not expect it to at our distance.   I rationalized at first it was a balloon floating from the light into the atmosphere and thus disappearing, but something was off about that idea.  However, as I approached it went from a darker color to gray, and then disappeared almost as if backing away.   We all 3 were very creeped out and thought it was a drone or definitely a UFO.   Still thinking about it, but it moved so quickly away once I approached it, I couldn’t really process things.   Anyway, definitely saw a UFO last night and first time I have ever posted something like this.

records.summary: Possible sighting of rocket launch, seen from NYC
records.story: Possible sighting of rocket launch, seen from NYC Looking due north at 4am, I saw what appeared to be the flame from a rocket launch from very far away.  It was orange and brighter than Venus.   The approximate direction of travel was west.  It was difficult to tell if its movement was NW, due W, or SW.   I noticed it when it was ~30 degrees above the horizon.  At about 40 degrees, it was blocked by clouds.  The reason I say it appeared to be a rocket flame is because it looked very similar to a Space Shuttle launch into polar orbit that I watched from New Jersey many years ago. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Saw three orange orbs moving steadily, hovering, and then traveling vast distances within seconds, over Brooklyn, NY.
records.story: Saw three orange orbs moving steadily, hovering, and then traveling vast distances within seconds, over Brooklyn, NY. On June 22, 2014, I was sitting on my private outdoor rooftop in Brooklyn, NY, (Williamsburg) with a friend of mine.  I watch the sky every night - I can usually find Mars if it is visible, can identify numerous constellations, know the difference between a satellite and an airplane, and just love to stare out into space.   At about 10:17 PM, I was looking at the sky as I always do, but it wasn't a very clear night and very few stars were visible due to the massive light pollution created by the New York City lights.   Out of the corner of my eye I noticed an orange glowing orb of light.  After doing a quick double-take, I saw there were actually three orbs of light moving across the sky in a way I have NEVER seen any craft or airplane or satellite move - ever.  It was completely silent and seemed to float through the air.  I instantly knew I was seeing a UFO; I had absolutely no doubt in my mind. In the midst of my excitement/awe/disbelief, I grabbed my iPhone and tried to record as much as I could (I knew that if I didn't capture this experience no one would ever believe me).  The orbs of light moved across the sky and I took my first video but to the blind eye and without the technology needed to slow down the video, all I could see was the black night sky.  I had a feeling that nothing was on that video and quickly tried to take another one before it was too late.  Fortunately,  I was able to switch the camera on in time and record what I did.  For two weeks I didn't think I had captured anythng, until I decided to watch the videos on my computer.  There is not person who I've showed this to who can come up with any plausible explanation for what I saw and recorded. The three orbs of light were moving Northeast and started very low - pretty close to some of the taller buildings.  As it moved across the sky (in a pretty slow and stable pace) it began to rise in elevation before hovering for about 20 seconds almost directly above the building across the street from me.  As it hovered there the lights remained solid and then out of nowhere the 3 lights moved rapidly throughout that area of the sky - not side to side but in terms of elevation. It was hard to determine at first whether the three orbs were all one object or if they were in fact three seperate crafts.   After watching the orbs move as they did here, both in unison and independant paths, it was clear that this was one entity.  It then descended at an extremely rapid pace and then just vanished.   I immediately fell to the ground with tears streaming out of my eyes.  I knew what I had just witnessed and was overwhlem with shock, happiness, confimation, fear, confusion, etc.  I've always known that other life existed and that UFOs regularly visit the Earth, but I never in a million years thought I would be lucky enough to witness such an encounter, let alone capture it on video.

I was hoping someone else outside of us on the street saw it I even yelled to get attention but the streets were vacant. I've been trying to make sense of it for two years.  After a lot of research, I know what I witness was something of demonic/alien. records.story: Unusual dark craft moving slow across the sky in the bronx. Looking westward up into the sky I noticed a dark object slowly moving through a northerly direction. records.summary: 2 Orange Orbs flying in low formation over the Hudson River in Manhattan, NYC.
records.story: 2 Orange Orbs flying in low formation over the Hudson River in Manhattan, NYC 2 Bright orange orbs flying in tandem/formation over Hudson River near 145 street in Manhattan, NYC [was raised in that area so I’m pretty sure about location].  I pulled out my phone and took 3 pictures while driving on the Henry Hudson Parkway going northbound [hard to do driving 50mph].   Orbs were approx. 90 ~ 100 ft. above Hudson River at a distance from my vehicle of about 2 city blocks when first spotted.  Orbs were traveling southbound @ perhaps 40mph?  Second glance I saw the second orb trailing behind the first [probably 30 ft. distance] and also descending and getting closer to the River.  This time I tried to figure out their sizes but couldn't really determine it so I guessed that the circumference was about the length of my car [15 ft.?] They continued on their southern path at the same speed. I slowed down my vehicle to try to get a 3rd and a better look [some Brokeback mountain guy in his Lego set Toyota was honking his horn behind me until he saw me pointing out my window and at the object.  I saw his jaw drop and his eyes open via my rear view as he saw the orbs]  I ignored the driver behind me and looked to see that both orbs came to a complete stop in unison for about 5 or 6 seconds, then they continued to move southbound at the same speed I mentioned previously.  I lost sight of them as I continued to travel northbound. Both orbs were a steady bright luminescent orange with a slightly yellow tinted center [took a better look when they stopped].  I couldn’t hear any sounds as the orbs flew by due to a commercial plane flying overhead and there was a good amount of cars on both sides cancelling out all other noises.    At first I may have assumed they were military drones but I couldn’t find any reason to that [if military then why orange orbs?] especially when they completely stopped in mid-flight for more than a few seconds and then both continued their flight at the same time.   As I approached the George Washington Bridge I noticed several helicopters flying around and what seemed like 2 military jets circling the area as if they were searching for something.  This was really strange.   The 2 orbs were definitely UFO's [not saying a spaceship carrying aliens from another planet as many people ALWAYS assume that about UFO's]  I couldn’t stop talking about it at work while people are staring at me listening to the story like I’m crazy.  I quickly lessen their skepticism after showing the photos.   I searched Google Images and YouTube and found that these Orange Orbs are a very common sighting especially around the Hudson River from Manhattan all the way up north as far as Albany.  I guess it was my turn to see them...

records.summary: Witnessed a weird glowing cloud approximately 25 stories in the air.  What drew my attention , was that two glowing white orbs of light

What proceeded this was small tiny lights/sparkles zig zagging around on street level where I had been sitting on a park bench.   I don't recollect what happened to the second glowing orb, but the second I followed from the ground, darting around in the sky. I then took out my smart phone to take pictures.  This one light first hovered in front of  a 24th story window.  It then shot around to the side of the building and hovered above the building motionless as if it recognized that I was taking a picture of it.  Also at this time the "glowing cloud" took on a sphere shape with the sun directly behind it.  It stood out because the sky was clear save for this one "cloud."  As it became spherical, it hovered very close to the roof of this 26 story building; with parts of this cloud obfuscated part of the railing alongside the roof.  I can provide pictures.

Reddish bell shaped light appeared between Helicopter and plane height at 40.6176° N, 74.0117° W.  My estimate is 10,000-20,000 feet.   Moved very slow from NE to SW at 40.6176° N, 74.0117° W.   Within 20-30 seconds began accent/climb and within 10-20 seconds jetted deep into space like nothing I have ever seen.  The ascent was something out of star wars/star trek. records.summary: Orange orbs of light popping out of nowhere!
records.story: Orange orbs of light popping out of nowhere! My girlfriend and I were walking home from getting dinner, when I saw in the distance what looked like a orange orb of light that seem to come out of nowhere.  At first, I was wow look at that!  It looks strange!!    Then as my girlfriend observed it another just like it appeared!!  I said wow look another one!!  She was like, "What you think that is??"  I told her I don't know but it looks weird!   Then another popped out of nowhere from in the area of the first we saw!!  It was amazing!!   So I started watching the the third one as to see if it was following the the first two and as I watched them they started to kind of disapear!  My back facing where they came from I turned around and observed another coming my way from the same direction! I had to take my phone out to record this!!!   Next thing you know, one after another flying in the same direction started popping up!  I couldn't get a good view of them with my phone so I stopped recording to use a app I had on my phone!  It's like a binoculars app.  I took some pretty good pictures and then proceeded to film again!   At that time a young lady with what I guess was her father asked what was going on.  As they looked up they were amazed as well!  The father suggested I call the cops, as by that time, about fifteen passed us all going in the same direction.   So, I proceeded to walk home, while filming as much as I can.  There wasn't many people in the street, and the few that were around weren't paying us attention.  I know what a helicopter looks like at night and that was not helicopters!!  Nor were they drones!  Over twenty of those things past by Us! I have film and photos!!  Amazing!!!  And they were not lanterns!  Lanterns don't fly!  They hover!

records.summary: 30 or Yellowish/Orange spheres flying slowly overhead. At one point stopping and hovering.
records.story: 30 or Yellowish/Orange spheres flying slowly overhead. At one point stopping and hovering. Around 10pm I saw a procession of slow-moving gold/orange lights (round), moving slowly across the sky toward the direction of my home and then flying over.    At first there were two or three, but they were followed by more and more and more, in a seemingly never-ending stream that lasted quite a while (maybe 10 minutes or more?).  They were coming from the south or southwest and moving northward.  There were no other lights, no blinking or flickering (like on a plane or helicopter) and I didn’t hear any sound.  They were low-flying and moved together slowly.  Some were fairly close together, others spaced further apart.   At one point, they hovered in place before slowly moving onward again.  We see and hear planes flying over, on their way to the airport, all day long, on a daily basis, here.   At times, we have helicopters circling overhead.  This was most definitely neither.  It was also not the Perseids.  Never saw anything even remotely like this before.

records.summary: Shape shifting, teleporting UFO.
records.story: Shape shifting, teleporting UFO I was in my room, in front of my large window looking at men cutting down city trees.  I looked up at the men, since they were at the very top, and saw something that caught my eye.  At first, thinking that this was just an aluminum balloon,  That object was sturdy, still, and in the clear sky.  Light flashing out of the object, but this wasn't an ordinary light.  It very bright, and soon, the light started to pulse.  Following after that, it changed shape. Originally shaped like a triangle, and each light was on its coordinated areas.  Followed up by a square, and lastly a circle.   At this point, I called my daughter, because i feared that I was looking at a hallucination.  Thankfully, I wasn't the only witness.  She saw this object too, and we were freaking out at this point.  Watching, talking, and staring at what possible movements this could have done.   It then, started to move very slowly, stopped, gained speed and disappeared.  My daughter even ran outside to check our backyard, to see if it might've been there.  However, it just completely disappeared. ((NUFORC Note:  We attempted to contact the source of this report via telephone, but were unsuccessful.  We are undecided as to whether this was submitted as a serious-minded report.  PD))

records.summary: 30-40 orbs sighted moving through cloud cover in Queens NY
records.story: 30-40 orbs sighted moving through cloud cover in Queens NY I thought I was seeing stars, at firs,t then suddenly realized the objects were moving.  I looked in another area and another one.  The clouds were moving fast and starting to cover quickly though the little openings a light would appear and than be gone moving in its own direction.   At first, I thought I was just the clouds moving against the sky but I started testing each object by using the telephone pole and the wire and I stood still and the objects were moving fast pass my set focus points.   I then ran inside and got my GF and the sky was almost completely covered with clouds. strange cloud fog..  Tiny little holes would open in the sky and you would see one and another and another moving in the same direction.  If that same place was again clear the objects were not in the sky.  Must have seen 30 of these objects before the sky was completely covered with cloud fog.   I retuned outside 45 mins later around 830pm and the sky was completely clear and the stars were ! in there natural place and no clouds to be seen.

records.story: I saw a strange whiteness in the sky which I tried to photograph, but got other photos instead. I was having communications I felt that I should go out that night with a camera because I might see something that night. I live in East Harlem, and I was instructed to go south at first down 3rd Ave.  I saw several fast moving lights but they were too fast for me to photograph, or once the camera on the phone did not work when I pressed the little camera icon on the screen.  When I got to 109th Street I received instructions to go west one block to Lexington Ave. When I got to the corner I saw a strange whiteness in the sky behind some distant clouds to the southwest.  I put the phone up to take a picture and there was a big flash of light when I took the picture.  I tried two more times right away and the same thing happened.  'When I looked at the photos later I was surprised to see some strange photos.  I checked the details of each photo and the flash was off it said. I can't explain these photos, but the saucer like object in the first photo reminded me of a black saucer I saw before.  Also there is a video on the internet of a black ship rising up from the ground in the mountains somewhere, then hovering in front of a power station or something, and lights like the windows light up like in my photo. Something to consider.

records.summary: Oval shaped solid object non illuminated hovering motionless approximately 2000 ft over the East River of Manhattan, NYC.
records.story: Oval shaped solid object non illuminated hovering motionless approximately 2000 ft over the East River of Manhattan, NYC. I am 57 years old and a paralegal for an investment advisor firm in New York City.  I live in a studio apt on the top floor of a 4th Floor walk-up in the Kip’s Bay area on the East Side of Manhattan.  There is a balcony in the back of the apt that has a view facing the skyline looking out over the East River towards Queens and Brooklyn.   I often go out to the balcony on warm clear nights to look at the stars and get some fresh air.  I went out 2 nights ago, on June 21st, around midnight, when I spotted a strange object hovering over the East River.  It looked like a roundish, oval shape that was not illuminated except for the city lights shining up on it and the nearly full moon behind it.  It looked to be about  1/5th  the size of a normal full moon from where I was standing which was about 5 blocks from the East River.  The altitude was higher than the Empire State Building which stands west of my vantage point.  It looked to be at least as big as a house in my estimation. 	It was a clear night with just a few small puffy clouds still hanging in the sky near the object and I thought that maybe the object was just a small portion of a cloud but there was a breeze blowing North and the other clouds soon blew past the object and dissipated while the object remained in the same spot and hovered completely motionless.  At this point I thought I might have something out of the ordinary here so I ran back into my apartment and got my binoculars.  I steadied the binoculars against a balcony railing and managed to capture the object in my sights.  It looked oval shaped and had sort of a greenish, grayish color.  I could not discern any details such as windows or defining structure because it was difficult to keep in focus.  I thought I may have seen a few tiny pinpoint size colored lights but cannot be certain. 	After a few moments it began to slowly move north towards upper Manhattan and I could see stars passing behind it as it moved.  I could not hear any sound coming from it.  After moving north for a few hundred yards it changed direction and started heading due East over Long Island City in Queens.  I lost sight of it after a very tall tree in a neighboring yard blocked my view.  I waited for a half an hour to see if it would return but it never did.  The full sighting lasted about 8 mins.  									June 23, 2016

records.summary: First of all sorry for my English writing. We were visiting WTC groundzero with my wife. I was capturing continously without focusing a
records.story: First of all, sorry for my English writing.   We were visiting WTC groundzero with my wife.  I was capturing continously without focusing a specific object.  I captured many photos.  In one minute I captured 3 photos consecutively.  After holiday while I and my wife viewing photos we found an Unidentified object and it was flying above.   We didn't detect it with naked eyes when we were visiting WTC.  I don't belive that US Goverment lets an ordinary vechile to fly above WTC.  Maybe this is an undetected vechile or it was a made in USA UFO. In photo 1 there are colorful circles.  In Photo 2 that circles are replacing and an UFO appears suddenly.  In photo 3 there is no light no UFO.  I want professionals to analyze the images and I am so curious about results.  I was not a believer but I was ready to believe.  Now I want to believe!

records.summary: Seen from my balcony, two bright red spheres (no blinking lights) followed an erratic flight path, or remained stationary.
records.story: Seen from my balcony, two bright red spheres (no blinking lights) followed an erratic flight path, or remained stationary, started again their pattern of sudden changing of direction. ((ADDENDUM FROM WITNESS)) Hello again, Mr. Davenport!  The precise date was last Saturday, July 16 2016.  I cannot be too precise about the time ... it was between 10:00PM and 11PM. For certain it was not after 11PM (I was on the balcony with my father during the sighting, then he left to watch the 11 local news).  That Saturday, I helped my sister packing (she's moving to her new house), and I was very tired.  I didn't come home from my sister before 9-9:30PM so the time I went out on the balcony must have been between 10:30PM and 11PM.    I forgot to mention that the spheres were quite big (my father was able to see them, his vision isn't too good).  Bigger than, let's say, the lights attached to the wings of an airplane. Their size, color and movement had caught my eye. Since that evening I searched the net to see if other people have had similar sightings (red spheres).  I found a couple of video clips, with different dates and locations, only in them the spheres were blinking.  I didn't know about this kind of spheres before I am familiar with the UFO  phenomenon, actually, I had had another sighting many years ago, not in the States.  Mr. Davenport, if you want the exact location/position of the sighting, I can give you my home address.  With Google Earth you can access my street, which has at one end the highway wall (the sighting was above the wall, the spheres appeared from behind the wall, then disappeared only to reappear again, a couple of times).  I hope this helps.  Sincerely,  ((name deleted)) ((END ADDENDUM))

records.summary: Object hovering over NYC
records.story: Object hovering over NYC This object didn't move.  It flashed lights approx every 30 seconds which included red & white bright lights in circular motions with bursts.  When not light it had luminous lighting. It never moved!  I first thought a blimp but this was round not oval.  I've never seen anything like it.  At approx 11:30 pm, in front of my eyes, it vanished in a split second.  A blimp would not do that! Freaky!

records.summary: White lights seen flying slowly over Manhattan or Brooklyn, NY
records.story: White lights seen flying slowly over Manhattan or Brooklyn, NY Observed 5 or more lights flying slowly in the sky.  Don't know what they were.  Could have been helicopters, but not sure.   Please see the video taken from my phone:  https://youtu.be/9158Y4Kq-Wc

records.summary: Huge Egg Shaped Glowing Hovering Behind Manhattan (Seen from Brooklyn: Bushwick Rooftop)
records.story: Huge Egg Shaped Glowing Hovering Behind Manhattan (Seen from Brooklyn: Bushwick Rooftop) A looming, glowing, egg-shaped object appeared in the sky at around 10:30 pm and began to hover left and right up and down across what was guesstimated to be the JFK bridge.  The egg flashed between red, white and a greenish tinge but would resume to a glowing white while stationary and didn't move at all.  It suddenly would go off (become dark but still slightly visible) the bottom of the shape was dimly lit.   The object was in the sky for a good 30 minutes repeating the movements and changing of color as it crossed along the back of Manhattan from the view of outer Manhattan.   The object then began to hover slowly along the Manhattan line (behind the city/the Hudson presumably) and stopped right about at the Upper West Side area and disappeared in a split second completely.

records.summary: UFO sightings over NYC (multiple occurrences).
records.story: UFO sightings over NYC (multiple occurrences) Hi, I'm Jason, we spoke on the phone earlier about my many sightings over NYC and I was encouraged to write about one specifically.  I have been using meditative techniques I learned from Dr. Steven Greer's CE5 initiative and applied it to my own practice.  I've been witnessing many orb like UFO sightings during these meditations and have been able to document lots of high strangeness.  There are far too many experiences and incidents to paint the clearest picture of what is happening in just one report, which is why I felt confused about how to report such a long timeline of events.  Despite all these antidotal words, I have documented what I could via my YouTube channel.  It's very basic, no music, no graphics, and all short and to the point.  It's hard to pick out the best video, but I am posting 2 links here, with the first video being the date and time linked to this report.  As I said, my channel is quite simple and you're more than welcomed to see the rest of my videos at your leisure to help understand how frequent it is.  Most sightings, including the one from this report are from my high rise apartment looking out toward midtown Manhattan.  There's telepathy involved in this experience as well as other phenomena that I don't think is productive going into in a format like this. https://youtu.be/rRzSxESV608  https://youtu.be/cRDKX190ZdM

records.summary: Bright red round object appeared above a building and was stationary for about 3-4 minutes. Suddenly descended and moved quickly to the
records.story: Bright red round object appeared above a building and was stationary for about 3-4 minutes.   Suddenly descended and moved quickly to the right above trees and other lower building roofs.

records.summary: Two fast spheres orange in color were moving north by northwest over Brooklyn.
records.story: two fast spheres orange in color were moving north by northwest over Brooklyn at 23:00 hours on May 20th 2016. On 5th avenue and 16th street looking east by southeast there was two orange orbs moving at twice the speed of the usual aircraft in the sky heading north by northwest.  The first one was almost at 23:00 on the hour, the second was a few minutes later at 23:05.   There was also a high altitude jet moving north, a commercial jet moving west towards newark at a lower altitude and a jet coming in from the south moving towards JFK or Laguaria airport.   The two orange spheres did not have lateral blinking lights, they did not make any sounds like helicopters and the color was almost pumpkin as opposed to the usual yellow/white aircraft color.

records.story: White hazy ball of light almost the size of the moon flew by underneath the full moon in a matter of 3 seconds and vanished in the middle of the sky.. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))

records.summary: Cluster of fireball objects.
records.story: Cluster of fireball objects. A cluster of reddish orange glowing balls of light flashing.  Very close together.  Too many and too close for them all to be planes.  Too high and too close for them all to be helicopters.  There was no sound.  A few drivers, including myself, pulled over into a gas station to actually see what they could have been.  There were a few seconds that objects disappeared and then reappeared, still very close together traveling north east, but more east.   I did not call police because they might think I'm nuts.  I hope someone else experienced this besides me and others in town?

records.summary: NYC UFO.
records.story: NYC  UFO. While traveling west in Queens on the LIE into Manhattan, I noticed an object hanging still in the sky south towards Brooklyn.   It was shaped like a corpuscle on its side and appeared whitish in color.  It did not move.   It hung there in the sky for about 2-3 minutes.  It was not a plane or a helicopter.   I was on a bus moving quickly and could not take a photo.

records.summary: Witnessed 6-7 multi-colored lights in a random formation.  The event lasted 5 minutes.  Each light vanished one at a time.
records.story: Witnessed 6-7 multi colored lights in a random formation.  The event lasted 5 minutes.  Each light vanished one at a time in the evening southwest sky over Bronx County, NYC. ((NUFORC Note:  Witness elects to remain totally anonymous; provides no contact information.  PD))
